data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Srisonchai, Ruttapon, Enghoff, Henrik, Likhitrakarn, Natdanai, Panha, Somsak (2018): A revision of dragon millipedes III: the new genus Gigaxytes gen. nov., with the description of three new species (Diplopoda, Polydesmida, Paradoxosomatidae). European Journal of Taxonomy 463: 1-43, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2018.463|55 occurrences
